desc: KnitAntics offers the joy and luxury of hand-dyed silk yarns, patterns, and our own creations with a healthy dose of whimsy. Our hand-dyed yarn is 100% mulberry silk, as are the items made from our yarn. Our patterns are all original creations inspired by nature and fantasy.

layout.text: Knit Antics donates a portion of all proceeds to charitable causes. Click here to see who we support.
